text:
Originally reported by: **Claudiu Popa (BitBucket: [PCManticore](http://bitbucket.org/PCManticore), GitHub: @PCManticore)**

---

The object.**new** decorator creates an instance under the hood.

```
#!python

@object.__new__
class A:
   pass

A #@

```

---
- Bitbucket: https://bitbucket.org/logilab/astroid/issue/172
title: Understand object.__new__ decorator
